headline: Citi Raises Price Target for M&T Bank (MTB), Keeps Neutral Rating
summary: M&T Bank Corporation (NYSE:MTB) is one of the 10 Best Financial Stocks on Wall Street’s Radar. On July 18, Citi increased its price target for M&T Bank Corporation (NYSE:MTB) from $212 to $215 but kept a “Neutral” rating. This decision came after the company reported its second quarter 2025 results. Citi described the latest quarterly […]
